document_data.mainbody:
Lord Landrar Dathcloake was a noble of Cormyr in the late 15 century DR.
During the Council of the Dragon in late Mirtul of the , Landrar Dathcloake proposed a council of nobles that would have governance over the War Wizards of Cormyr, the armies, and that would choose successors for the royal line. He got cheered for that.
Later, after the Council degenerated into violence and was assaulted by a blueflame ghost, and the nobility left the chamber, the evil vampire archmage Manshoon believed he spotted Dathcloake blustering at the Purple Dragons guarding the entrance, trying without success to gain access.
